About Us

We enable you complete business transactions by delivering mail and packages

Mission

To enable businesses complete transactions through delivery of mail and packages

Values

Innovation, Integrity & Professionalism

Vision

To connect people through seamless delivery of packages.

Timeline

Before we started, our founder who was working in the FMCG industry noticed

that there was a constant demand for fast and secure delivery services for sensitive and time-bound documents.

As a result Byke It was founded in March 2019 to fill that delivery niche.

To date, we continue to provide bespoke services to our esteemed clients.

Who we are

A business that enables people and businesses move packages and run errands in Nairobi without the hassle of traffic, long queues, etc.

Our team

We are a vibrant team made up of the Management, a Customer Service team and Riders who work hand in hand to ensure that all deliveries are done in time.

Subscribe to our Newsletter

Go further with Byke It Deliveries

We want to serve more businesses and corporates.

You can contact us on our social media pages or Send us a message.
